item.title: Hello world
item.description: Hello, and welcome to this tiny corner of the internet controlled by me: Dave Hillis. I’ve been wanting to play with writing as a hobby, and I figured that a blog gave me an opportunity to give that a try. Even though Google Trends shows that blogging peaked around 2009, I’m just finally getting onto that bandwagon. I’d like to use this space to discuss some topics that interest me: math, software development, traffic, books, etc.
